IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO IMPROVE WORKING CONDITIONS AND LIVING STANDARDS OF MEMBERS THROUGH COLLECTIVE BARGAINING, EDUCATION, TRAINING AND EMPLOYEE BENEFITS AND TO ESTABLISH NECESSARY PROCEDURES FOR AMICABLE ADJUSTMENT OF ALL DISPUTES WHICH MAY ARISE BETWEEN EMPLOYERS AND EMPLOYEES.

IRS990.Desc: TO IMPROVE WORKING CONDITIONS AND LIVING STANDARDS OF MEMBERS THROUGH COLLECTIVE BARGAINING, EDUCATION, TRAINING AND EMPLOYEE BENEFITS AND TO ESTABLISH NECESSARY PROCEDURES FOR AMICABLE ADJUSTMENT OF ALL DISPUTES WHICH MAY ARISE BETWEEN EMPLOYERS AND EMPLOYEES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE DEFENSE FUND PROVIDES FOR ARBITRATION AND STRIKE ASSISTANCE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: THE DISREGARDED ENTITY WAS ESTABLISHED AS A NOMINEE TO HOLD TITLE TO REAL ESTATE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 6: Explanation of Classes of Members or Shareholder
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Members in good standing have the right to elect the governing body and to approve significant decisions of the governing body.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 7a: How Members or Shareholders Elect Governing Body
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING BODY IS ELECTED BY THE MEMBERSHIP. ALL MEMBERS IN GOOD STANDING HAVE VOTING RIGHTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 7b: Describe Decisions of Governing Body Approval by Members or Shareholders
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SIGNIFICANT DECISIONS OF THE GOVERNING BODY ARE SUBJECT TO THE APPROVAL OF THE MEMBERS IN GOOD STANDING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 WAS PREPARED IN COORDINATION WITH UNION PERSONNEL WHO WORK FULL TIME FOR THE ORGANIZATION. ONCE COMPLETE, THE FORM WAS PROVIDED TO AND REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE BOARD PRIOR TO SUBMISSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL EXPENDITURES OF A SIGNIFICANT NATURE ARE REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE BOARD WHICH HAS THE OPPORTUNITY AT THE TIME OF SUCH APPROVAL TO REVIEW THE TRANSACTION AND TO INQUIRE IF ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICT EXISTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE UNION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO ALL MEMBERS UPON REQUEST. THE CONSTITUTION AND BY-LAWS ARE SUBMITTED TO THE OFFICE OF LABOR-MANAGEMENT STANDARDS OF THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AS REQUIRED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Other Changes In Net Assets Or Fund Balances - Other Increases
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TRANSFERS FROM CONTROLLED ENTITY - 141-57 NORTHERN BLVD INC = $22767209

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: IUOE LOCAL 14-14B VOL POL ACTION CMTE

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: TO SUPPORT LEGISLATION FAVORABLE TO LABOR
